global.tmp: The-M-Project is a mobile HTML5 JavaScript framework which helps you build great mobile apps easy and fast.
global.sign_up: Sign up to know when it's released!
global.create: Create mobile apps with web technologies
global.intro_tmp2: Cross-platform and cross-device at its best
global.intro_tmp2_text: We believe in the cross-platform strategy, so we support the major ones. The range of devices and versions differs a lot, so we provide a stable ground on which amazing apps can be built. We help you address all major platforms and their specialities. Beginning on navigation concepts and ending with performance optimizations.
global.v2text: We are happy to announce a new version of The-M-Project. We had great experiences with the current version and we would like to improve it; we rethought everything and came up with new ideas, tools and features. Stay tuned to see how you will profit from the new version. Wonder why it is called Absinthe? Since Google uses sweets, Apple animals and version numbers are boring, we switched the release names to alcoholic beverages ;)
global.bd_text: Without developer effort, data is synchronized from the server to the client. Changes are broadcasted to all connected clients live, are available offline and changeable, and, by limiting the transfer of modified records, loading times and traffic can be optimized.
global.tmp_coming_soon: Best of breed – Web technologies brought to mobile
global.join: Join our community. Spread the word: twitter.com/_themproject
global.copyright: Copyright © 2013 M-Way Solutions GmbH All rights reserved.
global.welcome_coder: Hey fellow! Want to have a preview? Just look at the source code - it was written with an early state of The-M-Project v2.0
global.logosWebTechnologie: The-M-Project is based on web technologies and runs in every evergreen browser.
global.logosTechnologie: Great opportunities through enterprise ready frameworks.
global.logosToolchain: We want to focus – so we implemented Espresso commands in other stable build tools.
global.logosTools: The-M-Project is open source and fits perfectly with these services.
global.not_valid: It seems that there was an email validation error
